front.title: Efficient Protocols for Binary Fields in the 3-Party Honest Majority MPC Setting

abstract.t: A three party, honest majority system provides the most efficient protocols for Multiparty Computation (MPC). This document describes a concrete instantiation of addition and multiplication protocols that provide strong guarantees of security. The multiplication protocol provides low communication and computation costs, with addition being almost free. Any single dishonest party is detected with high probability.
